item.title: About
item.description: This site is maintained by Noah Johnson of Stitch-Rite Embroidery Service The pdf documents were all scanned at a very high resolution and processed to be searchable via text input. For example, searching “looper” or “timing” should get you close to the areas of interest that Ruth covers. The materials and content on this website were scanned and curated to be free reference for the bonnaz embroidery community. All of the Artistic Touch publications found here are still under copyright.

item.title: Bonnie Williams
item.description: Trained By Ruther Franklin This site would not be possible without the generosity of Bonnie Williams and her 40 years of dedicated work in the embroidery industry. Bonnie met Ruth Franklin in 1979 and spent time learning to operate the Singer 114w103 bonnaz machine under Ruth’s supervision. A full machine dissasembly, hours of embroidering squares to learn how to get sharp corners, Ruth ensured that Bonnie would become a skilled operator.
